page.title: 06THE INDUSTRIAL ESTATE
page.content: A small development to the North East of Baginton and just south of the main Stonebridge Highway . It was establis hed in 1974. The units are all fairly small employing on average 150 people each. Almost all are connected with transport and distribution, not maki ng te product themselves,but buying in and re-selling such as Covpac which has been on the site only since Feb. 1985.Other units include a timber yard a telecomunications contractor B.R.S a caravan hire unit,a travel firm and a machine tool buyer.An interesting unit is the Industrial Training Unit which provides the mentally handicapped with 'protected employment'. It is part of Coventry Social Services.Since 1974 3 firms have left, all engineering units all went out of business.Main draw- backs arerelative in accessibility and state of roads.
